home.heroDescription1: Homemade dishes by passionate chefs, delivered right to your door. Explore our selection of culinary delights prepared with love and fresh ingredients.
home.heroDescription2: Order now and savor the excellence of local cuisine!
home.heroMainTitle: Choose real homemade food from your neighborhood!
home.heroSubtitle: MIAMLO connects food lovers with passionate cooks near them, homemade dishes inspired by cuisines from around the world, at affordable prices.
home.heroNotification: Sign up now to be notified of the launch in your city.
home.conceptTitle: Eating local has never been so easy
home.conceptSubtitle: MIAMLO highlights local culinary talents. Discover and order homemade dishes, prepared by passionate and verified cooks.
home.conceptLocalDesc: Discover cooks a few streets away from you, follow their creations and let yourself be tempted.
home.conceptHomemadeDesc: From family recipes to gourmet dishes, inspired by flavors from around the world. Let yourself be tempted by comforting dishes, carefully prepared, far from industrial food.
home.conceptSocialDesc: MIAMLO recreates connections with your neighbors and highlights the culinary talents around you.
home.howSubtitle: In a few minutes, you discover, order and pick up your dish.
home.howStep1Desc: Open MIAMLO, filter by type of cuisine (maghreb, italian, asian, vegetarian‚Ä¶) and discover dishes available around you, in real time.
home.howStep2Desc: Validate your portion, pickup time and pay online via a secure solution. The cook receives your order directly.
home.howStep3Desc: Go to the indicated address, scan your MIAMLO QR code and leave with your still hot dish. Enjoy, then leave a review.
home.gourmandSubtitle: A new way to eat well, local and homemade, without hassle.
home.gourmandCard1Desc: Authentic recipes prepared with love by your neighbors, far from industrial food.
home.gourmandCard2Desc: Generous portions, often cheaper than classic delivery platforms.
home.gourmandCard3Desc: Dishes available a few minutes walk away: you order, you pick up, you enjoy.
home.chefSubtitle: Share your culinary talent and earn extra income, at your own pace, from your kitchen.
home.chefCard1Desc: Present your specialties, your photos and the story of your recipes on your MIAMLO profile.
home.chefCard2Desc: You choose your days, your schedules and the number of portions available at each service.
home.chefCard3Desc: MIAMLO manages online payment: you receive your due automatically, without hassle.
home.securitySubtitle: We implement a clear framework to protect foodies and cooks.
home.securityCard1Desc: Identity verification of cooks, confirmed address and contact information accessible in one click.
home.securityCard2Desc: Each cook commits to a simple and precise hygiene charter (cleanliness, cold chain, allergens, etc.).
home.securityCard3Desc: Ratings and comments are never bought. Your feedback helps highlight the best talents.
home.faqSubtitle: A simple app, but we already answer your main questions.
home.faq1Question: üìç In which cities will MIAMLO be available?
home.faq1Answer: We are starting with a few pilot cities in √éle-de-France, then will progressively open other neighborhoods. Sign up to be informed of MIAMLO's arrival near you.
home.faq2Question: üí∂ How much does it cost for the customer?
home.faq2Answer: You only pay the price of the dish. During the launch phase, no service fees will be applied for early users.
home.faq3Question: üë©‚Äçüç≥ Who can become a MIAMLO cook?
home.faq3Answer: Any adult, with a real passion for cooking and ready to respect our hygiene charter. Additional information will be specified in the app during registration.
home.faq4Question: üì≤ The app is not yet online, what can I do?
home.faq4Answer: You can already share MIAMLO around you and scan the QR code to leave your email. You will be among the first to test the platform.

section1.title: 1. Information Collected
section1.intro: We collect the following information when you use our platform:
items: Identification information (first name, last name, email)
Delivery information (address, phone)
Payment information (securely processed)
Order history and preferences

section2.title: 2. Data Usage
section2.intro: Your personal data is used to:
items: Process and deliver your orders
Improve our services and your user experience
Communicate with you regarding your orders
Send promotional offers (with your consent)

section3.title: 3. Data Protection
section3.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction.

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing
section4.intro: Your data may be shared with:
items: Partner chefs for preparing your orders
Delivery service providers
Secure payment processors
Legal authorities if required by law

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
items: Right to access your personal data
Right to rectify your data
Right to erasure of your data
Right to restriction of processing
Right to data portability
Right to object to processing

section6.title: 6. Cookies
section6.content: We use cookies to improve your experience on our site. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings.

section7.title: 7. Contact
section7.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, contact us at: privacy@miamlo.com

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using the Miamlo platform, you agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our services.

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.content: Miamlo is a platform that connects passionate chefs with customers who want to order homemade meals. We facilitate ordering, payment, and delivery of meals.

section3.title: 3. Registration and Account
section3.intro: To use certain services, you must create an account:
items: You must provide accurate and up-to-date information
You are responsible for the confidentiality of your password
You must be at least 18 years old to create an account
One account per person is allowed

section4.title: 4. Orders and Payments
items: All orders are subject to acceptance by the chef
Prices are indicated in euros including tax
Payment is made at the time of order
We accept credit cards and other indicated payment methods

section5.title: 5. Cancellation and Refund
items: You can cancel an order up to 2 hours before the scheduled delivery
Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days
In case of a problem with your order, contact our customer service
Late cancellations may incur fees

section6.title: 6. Responsibilities
items: Chefs are responsible for the quality and food safety of their dishes
We are not responsible for allergies or food intolerances
Delivery times are indicative and may vary
You must report any problem within 24 hours of receipt

section7.title: 7. Intellectual Property
section7.content: All content present on Miamlo (texts, images, logos, etc.) is protected by intellectual property rights. Any unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.

section8.title: 8. User Conduct
items: Not use the platform for illegal purposes
Respect other users and chefs
Not post offensive or inappropriate content
Not attempt to hack or disrupt the service

section9.title: 9. Modification of Terms
section9.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with a new update date.

section10.title: 10. Termination
section10.content: We may suspend or terminate your account in case of violation of these terms or abuse of the platform.

section11.title: 11. Applicable Law
section11.content: These terms are governed by French law. Any dispute will be submitted to the jurisdiction of French courts.

section12.title: 12. Contact
section12.content: For any questions regarding these terms, contact us at: legal@miamlo.com
